column4: OK, basically I can't watch any modern DVDs. DVDs from a few years ago seem to open, but newer ones simply arent' recognised. I have libdvdread4 and libdvdnav and w32codecs and all that installed, but it won't recognise the DVD at any level. The really strange thing is that I have watched some of these DVDs befor on this same machine, ont his very same installation of Jaunty.
maybe I should try clearing out the .libdvdcss folder?
